org.la4j.matrix.sparse

Class CCSMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.la4j.matrix.AbstractMatrix
      • org.la4j.matrix.sparse.AbstractCompressedMatrix
        • org.la4j.matrix.sparse.CCSMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Matrix, SparseMatrix

    public class CCSMatrix
extends AbstractCompressedMatrix
implements SparseMatrix
    This is a CCS (Compressed Column Storage) matrix class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
